PRAYER: Writ petition has been filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of
India, to issue Writ of Mandamus directing the respondents 1 to 4 to provide

police protection to the tractors/lorries/vehicles and workers engaged for
transportation of sugarcane cultivated from different agricultural fields to the
petitioner's factory premises and ensure smooth atmosphere in and around the
factory premises at Sakthi Nagar, Bhavani Taluk, Erode District by considering
the petitioner's representations dated 14.05.2020, 15.06.2020 and 28.04.2021.
